plot: Intrigue, betrayal, and redemption reign supreme high above the city's skylines where four window washers will swing open the curtain on the voyeuristic world that hangs just outside our window.
title: Squeegees
plot_es: Intrigue, betrayal, and redemption reign supreme high above the city's skylines where four window washers will swing open the curtain on the voyeuristic world that hangs just outside our window.
plot_en: Intrigue, betrayal, and redemption reign supreme high above the city's skylines where four window washers will swing open the curtain on the voyeuristic world that hangs just outside our window.
